StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMonthlyInterviewRpt]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Year varchar(4), @Month varchar(2), @RecruiterId uniqueidentifier =null, @OrgId int AS BEGIN
--Get all the Graduate Prospects SELECT p.ProspectId, p.Ac.vity, p.PersonId, p.Recrui.ngPersonId, p.Source, p.NwaId, pe.Educa.onCode INTO #GraduateProspect FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectEduca.on pe ON pe.ProspectId = p.ProspectId WHERE pe.Educa.onCode NOT IN ('H','M','S') and pe.LastUpdateDate = (SELECT max(pe2.LastUpdateDate) FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectEduca.on pe2 WHERE pe2.ProspectId = pe.ProspectId ) -- ERR *NOT THIS RELEASE - following what we already have* IN ('5','7','8','B','C','D','E','F','G','J','K','L','N','R','U','W','X') AND Ac.vity IN ('TC','OT','AC','HV','DC')
--Get all the Senior Prospects SELECT p.ProspectId, p.Ac.vity, p.PersonId, p.Recrui.ngPersonId, p.Source, p.NwaId, pe.Educa.onCode INTO #SeniorProspect FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectEduca.on pe ON pe.ProspectId = p.ProspectId WHERE pe.Educa.onCode IN ('H','M','S') AND pe.Educa.onLevel = '11' and pe.LastUpdateDate = (SELECT max(pe2.LastUpdateDate) FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectEduca.on pe2 WHERE pe2.ProspectId = pe.ProspectId ) -- ERR *NOT THIS RELEASE - following what we already have* IN ('1','2','H','M','S') AND Ac.vity IN ('TC','OT','AC','HV','DC')
-- Select graduates SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), e.StartDate, 106) [Date], pr.LastName + ',' + pr.FirstName [Name], 'GR' [Educa.on Level], pp.PhoneNumber [Telephone], hs.HighSchool_Name [School], rp.Rank_Code + ' ' + mp.Last_Name [Recruiter], p.Source, p.Ac.vity, p.ProspectId, p.NWAID FROM RSSOSS.USMC.Event e INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject s ON e.ID = s.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOwners eo ON e.ID = eo.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOutcome oc ON e.ID = oc.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventType et ON e.EventTypeId = et.ID INNER JOIN #GraduateProspect p ON s.subjectId = p.ProspectId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Person pr ON pr.PersonId = p.PersonId Le. outer JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.PersonPhone pp ON pr.PersonId = pp.PersonId and pp.PersonPhoneTypeId = 1 INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectSchool ps ON ps.ProspectId = p.ProspectId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.vwMcrissHighSchool hs ON hs.rowguid = ps.SchoolId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngPerson rp ON rp.rowguid = p.Recrui.ngPersonId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.vwMcrissPerson mp ON mp.Person_id = rp.Recrui.ng_Person_Id WHERE (InterviewOutcomeId=1 or InterviewOutcomeId=2) -- New Working Applicant or Follow-up AND et.Type != 'Follow Up' AND (@RecruiterID IS NULL OR @RecruiterID = eo.CreatorId) AND (@OrgID IS NULL OR e.Organiza.onId = @OrgID) AND (Ac.vity IN ('TC','OT','AC','HV','DC') ) AND e.IsApproved = 1 AND YEAR(StartDate) = @Year AND MONTH(StartDate) = @Month AND DATENAME(dw, StartDate) != 'Sunday'
UNION
-- Select seniors SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), e.StartDate, 106) [Date], pr.LastName + ',' + pr.FirstName [Name], 'SR' [Educa.on Level], pp.PhoneNumber [Telephone], hs.HighSchool_Name [School], rp.Rank_Code + ' ' + mp.Last_Name [Recruiter], p.Source, p.Ac.vity, p.ProspectId, p.NWAID FROM RSSOSS.USMC.Event e INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject s ON e.ID = s.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOwners eo ON e.ID = eo.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOutcome oc ON e.ID = oc.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventType et ON e.EventTypeId = et.ID INNER JOIN #SeniorProspect p ON s.subjectId = p.ProspectId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Person pr ON pr.PersonId = p.PersonId Le. outer JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.PersonPhone pp ON pr.PersonId = pp.PersonId and pp.PersonPhoneTypeId = 1 INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectSchool ps ON ps.ProspectId = p.ProspectId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.vwMcrissHighSchool hs ON hs.rowguid = ps.SchoolId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngPerson rp ON rp.rowguid = p.Recrui.ngPersonId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.vwMcrissPerson mp ON mp.Person_id = rp.Recrui.ng_Person_Id WHERE (InterviewOutcomeId=1 or InterviewOutcomeId=2) -- New Working Applicant or Follow-up AND et.Type != 'Follow Up' AND (@RecruiterID IS NULL OR @RecruiterID = eo.CreatorId) AND (@OrgID IS NULL OR e.Organiza.onId = @OrgID) AND (Ac.vity IN ('TC','OT','AC','HV','DC') ) AND e.IsApproved = 1 AND YEAR(StartDate) = @Year AND MONTH(StartDate) = @Month AND DATENAME(dw, StartDate) != 'Sunday'
DROP TABLE #GraduateProspect DROP TABLE #SeniorProspect
END
